div.p:
Letter not found. The text given here is from 'Cape Weed', Portland guardian and Normanby general advertiser, 17 October 1873, p. 2 (B73.10.04). The text is introduced by a note to the Editor by Atkinson:
'CAPE WEED. Dear Sir—I wrote to Dr Mueller the other day [letter not found] requesting information as to the easiest and most effectual way to destroy that horrible pest, the Cape weed. I enclose the doctor's reply, which, for the public good, I beg you will publish, and draw all the attention you can to it.' Melbourne, October 12, 1873
